summary: Client requested that Sarah set a vision meeting; the PM asked what the project should be called. Architect, Developer, and QA had no comments and were marked not_addressed.

actions.task: Schedule the vision meeting and distribute invite/agenda
Propose or confirm a name for the project

risks.risk: Architect, Developer, and QA were not addressed and provided no input, risking missing technical, implementation, or quality considerations for the vision meeting.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with Architect, Developer, and QA to gather their input before the meeting; circulate agenda and pre-reads and confirm their availability so their concerns are included.
